metadata.title: CVE-2021-39905 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An information disclosure vulnerability in the GitLab CE/EE API sinceversion 8.9.6 allows a user to see basic information on private groups thata public project has been shared with

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
